prompt: Return JSON with keys `a` and `b` only. `a` must be 2, `b` must be 5. Output ONLY the JSON object.
Return JSON of the form {"words": [...]}. The list must contain exactly 3 words, each exactly 4 letters long. Output ONLY the JSON object.
Return JSON of the form {"msg": "..."}. The msg must NOT contain the letter `e` (case-insensitive). Output ONLY the JSON object.
Return JSON of the form {"text": "...", "count": N}. The count must equal the number of characters in text (count every character, including spaces). Output ONLY the JSON object.
Return JSON of the form {"items": [...]}. items must equal ["alpha","beta","gamma"] in that exact order. Output ONLY the JSON object.
Return JSON of the form {"x": "...", "y": N}. x must be exactly 6 letters (a-z only). y must equal the number of vowels in x. Output ONLY the JSON object.
Return JSON of the form {"color": "..."}. color must be exactly one of: red, green, blue. No other tokens allowed. Output ONLY the JSON object.
Return a single-line JSON object with no spaces anywhere. It must be exactly {"ok":true}. Output ONLY the JSON object.
Return JSON of the form {"id": "NNN", "sum": S}. id must be exactly 3 digits. sum must equal the sum of those digits. Output ONLY the JSON object.
Return JSON of the form {"letters": "....", "unique": true/false}. letters must be exactly 4 characters (A-Z only). unique must be true iff all letters are different. Output ONLY the JSON object.
